mapper.select: select sa.id,sa.spu_id,sa.base_sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name, sav.id value_id,sav.spu_id,sav.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr sa inner join spu_sale_attr_value sav on sa.spu_id = sav.spu_id and sa.base_sale_attr_id = sav.base_sale_attr_id where sa.spu_id=#{spu_id} and sa.is_deleted = 0 and sav.is_deleted = 0
